task.summary: restructured HodgkinHuxleyFitter and changed new_optimization to optimization
make optimization algorithms work for server based optimization; plots sensitivity analysis
added code to decompose exp. cells sinus stimulus in ramp and theta
added function to evaluate model on all protocols

some updates in STA and noise modeling
plots for thesis started dap_mechanism plot
comp_stellate_pyramidal and double_ramp plot for thesis
new variable range for sensitivity analysis
update plots uses now same simulation parameters for all reproduction stellate plots
update plots uses now same simulation parameters for all dap mechanism plots uses rounded cell model for all reproduction and mechanism plots
